original_text: God is helping you to serve Christ well. That means that you believe in Christ. But it also means that you receive trouble and pain on his behalf. Both of those are gifts from God.
korean_text: 그리스도를 위하여 너희에게 은혜를 주신 것은 다만 그를 믿을 뿐 아니라 또한 그를 위하여 고난도 받게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: That means that you believe in Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 당신이 그리스도를 믿는다는 것을 의미합니다

sentences.original_text: that you receive trouble and pain
Both of those are gifts from God
sentences.korean_translation: 그 둘 다 하나님께서 주시는 선물입니다
